SELECT p.resource_id AS resourceId, p.role_id AS roleId, r.attribute AS roleAttribute, sr.path AS resourcePath FROM sys_resource_permission p INNER JOIN sys_resource AS sr ON sr.id = p.resource_id AND sr.deleted = 0 INNER JOIN sys_role r ON p.role_id = r.id AND r.deleted = 0 WHERE p.deleted = 0
AND sr.type = #{resourceType.name}
